content: Thanks for the company! See you!
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1013萨飞里_邀约

content: I'd love to keep spending time with you.
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1013萨飞里_邀约

content: Heading off now? Then I guess we'll stop here for today... Time really does fly when we're having fun.
info: 日常对话-邀约玩法-退出邀约-1013萨飞里_邀约

content: {A虎啸}<style=SizeBig>Hah!</style> No need to stand on ceremony! I always enjoy our time together. See you next time!

content: {A歪头}Of course. I'll be here for you whenever you need me. Kula bata!
